nodes.documentation: @dev Ends the event by owner

nodes.documentation: @dev Cancels the event by owner. When the event is canceled each participant can withdraw their deposit back.

nodes.documentation: @dev The event owner transfer the outstanding deposits  if there are any unclaimed deposits after cooling period

nodes.documentation:

@param _limitOfParticipants the number of the capacity of the event.
nodes.name: setLimitOfParticipants

nodes.documentation:
@dev Change the name of the event. The owner can change it as long as no one has registered yet.
@param _name the name of the event.
nodes.name: changeName

nodes.documentation:
@dev Mark participants as attended. The attendance cannot be undone.
@param _addresses The list of participant's address.
